author: George Glover
title: Stock Futures Slip Ahead of China-U.S. Trade Talks
description: Stocks are pointing lower before the market opens. Bitcoin is up and Treasury yields are down.
content: Stocks edged lower on Monday as officials from China and the U.S. prepared to meet in London. The worlds two largest economies are trying to broker a lasting trade truce, and the outcome will matter … [+434 chars]
